alert.note: Alert for Gila; Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 4:20PM MST until August 21 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MST FOR GILA...MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 420 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Top Of The World, or 10 miles northeast of Superior, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Globe, Miami, Top Of The World, Central Heights-Midland City, Top-Of-The-World, Claypool, and Inspiration. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 234 and 256. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 256. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 158 and 170. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
